name: CompositeConnectionResolver
desc:
Helper class that resolves connection and credential parameters,
validates them and generates connection options.

name: compose
desc: Composes Composite connection options from connection and credential parameters.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: finalizeOptions
desc:
Finalize merged options
This method can be overriden in child classes.

name: mergeConnection
desc:
Merges connection options with connection parameters
This method can be overriden in child classes.

name: mergeCredential
desc:
Merges connection options with credential parameters
This method can be overriden in child classes.

name: mergeOptional
desc:
Merges connection options with optional parameters
This method can be overriden in child classes.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves connection options from connection and credential parameters.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: validateConnection
desc:
Validates connection parameters and throws an exception on error.
This method can be overriden in child classes.

name: validateCredential
desc:
Validates credential parameters and throws an exception on error.
This method can be overriden in child classes.

name: ConfigReader
desc: Abstract config reader that supports configuration parameterization.

name: ConfigReader
desc: Creates a new instance of the config reader.

name: addChangeListener
desc: Adds a listener that will be notified when configuration is changed

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: parameterize
desc: Parameterized configuration template given as string with dynamic parameters.

name: readConfig
desc: Reads configuration and parameterize it with given values.

name: removeChangeListener
desc: Remove a previously added change listener.

name: ConnectionParams
desc:
Contains connection parameters to connect to external services.
They are used together with credential parameters, but usually stored
separately from more protected sensitive values.

name: ConnectionParams
desc: Creates a new connection parameters and fills it with values.

name: fromConfig
fromString
desc: Creates a new ConnectionParams object filled with key-value pairs serialized as a string.

name: fromTuples
desc:
Creates a new ConnectionParams object filled with provided key-value pairs called tuples.
Tuples parameters contain a sequence of key1, value1, key2, value2, ... pairs.

name: getDiscoveryKey
desc:
Gets the key to retrieve this connection from DiscoveryService.
If this key is null, than all parameters are already present.

name: getHost
desc: Gets the host name or IP address.

name: getPort
desc: Gets the port number.

name: getPortWithDefault
desc: Gets the port number with default value.

name: getProtocol
desc: Gets the connection protocol.

name: getProtocolWithDefault
desc: Gets the connection protocol with default value.

name: getUri
desc:
Gets the resource URI or connection string.
Usually it includes all connection parameters in it.

name: manyFromConfig
setDiscoveryKey
desc: Sets the key to retrieve these parameters from DiscoveryService.

name: setHost
desc: Sets the host name or IP address.

name: setPort
desc: Sets the port number.

name: setProtocol
desc: Sets the connection protocol.

name: setUri
desc: Sets the resource URI or connection string.

name: useDiscovery
desc:
Checks if these connection parameters shall be retrieved from DiscoveryService.
The connection parameters are redirected to DiscoveryService when discovery_key parameter is set.

name: ConnectionResolver
desc: Helper class to retrieve component connections.

name: ConnectionResolver
desc: Creates a new instance of connection resolver.

name: add
desc: Adds a new connection to component connections

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: getAll
desc: Gets all connections configured in component configuration.

name: register
desc:
Registers the given connection in all referenced discovery services.
This method can be used for dynamic service discovery.

name: resolve
desc:
Resolves a single component connection. If connections are configured to be retrieved
from Discovery service it finds a IDiscovery and resolves the connection there.

name: resolveAll
desc:
Resolves all component connection. If connections are configured to be retrieved
from Discovery service it finds a IDiscovery and resolves the connection there.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: ConnectionUtils
desc: A set of utility functions to process connection parameters

name: composeUri
desc:
Composes URI from config parameters.
The result URI will be in the following form:
protocol://username@password@host1:port1,host2:port2,...?param1=abc&param2=xyz&...

name: concat
desc: Concatinates two options by combining duplicated properties into comma-separated list

name: exclude
desc: Excludes specified keys from the config parameters.

name: include
desc: Includes specified keys from the config parameters.

name: parseUri
desc:
Parses URI into config parameters.
The URI shall be in the following form:
protocol://username@password@host1:port1,host2:port2,...?param1=abc&param2=xyz&...

name: rename
desc: Renames property if the target name is not used.

name: CredentialParams
desc:
Contains credentials to authenticate against external services.
They are used together with connection parameters, but usually stored
in a separate store, protected from unauthorized access.

name: CredentialParams
desc: Creates a new credential parameters and fills it with values.

name: fromConfig
fromString
desc: Creates a new CredentialParams object filled with key-value pairs serialized as a string.

name: fromTuples
desc:
Creates a new CredentialParams object filled with provided key-value pairs called tuples.
Tuples parameters contain a sequence of key1, value1, key2, value2, ... pairs.

name: getAccessId
desc:
Gets the application access id.
The value can be stored in parameters 'access_id' pr 'client_id'

name: getAccessKey
desc:
Gets the application secret key.
The value can be stored in parameters 'access_key', 'client_key' or 'secret_key'.

name: getPassword
desc:
Get the user password.
The value can be stored in parameters 'password' or 'pass'.

name: getStoreKey
desc:
Gets the key to retrieve these credentials from CredentialStore.
If this key is null, than all parameters are already present.

name: getUsername
desc:
Gets the user name.
The value can be stored in parameters 'username' or 'user'.

name: manyFromConfig
setAccessId
desc: Sets the application access id.

name: setAccessKey
desc: Sets the application secret key.

name: setPassword
desc: Sets the user password.

name: setStoreKey
desc: Sets the key to retrieve these parameters from CredentialStore.

name: setUsername
desc: Sets the user name.

name: useCredentialStore
desc:
Checks if these credential parameters shall be retrieved from CredentialStore.
The credential parameters are redirected to CredentialStore when store_key parameter is set.

name: CredentialResolver
desc: Helper class to retrieve component credentials.

name: CredentialResolver
desc: Creates a new instance of credentials resolver.

name: add
desc: Adds a new credential to component credentials

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: getAll
desc: Gets all credentials configured in component configuration.

name: lookup
desc:
Looks up component credential parameters. If credentials are configured to be retrieved
from Credential store it finds a ICredentialStore and lookups credentials there.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: DefaultConfigFactory
desc: Creates ICredentialStore components by their descriptors.

name: DefaultConfigFactory
desc: Create a new instance of the factory.

name: DiscoveryItem
desc: Used to store key-identifiable information about connections.

name: FileConfigReader
desc:
Abstract config reader that reads configuration from a file.
Child classes add support for config files in their specific format
like JSON, YAML or property files.

name: FileConfigReader
desc: Creates a new instance of the config reader.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: getPath
desc: Get the path to configuration file..

name: setPath
desc: Set the path to configuration file.

name: HttpConnectionResolver
desc: Helper class to retrieve connections for HTTP-based services abd clients.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: register
desc:
Registers the given connection in all referenced discovery services.
This method can be used for dynamic service discovery.

name: resolve
desc:
Resolves a single component connection. If connections are configured to be retrieved
from Discovery service it finds a IDiscovery and resolves the connection there.

name: resolveAll
desc:
Resolves all component connection. If connections are configured to be retrieved
from Discovery service it finds a IDiscovery and resolves the connection there.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: IConfigReader
desc:
Interface for configuration readers that retrieve configuration from various sources
and make it available for other components.

name: addChangeListener
desc: Adds a listener that will be notified when configuration is changed

name: readConfig
desc: Reads configuration and parameterize it with given values.

name: removeChangeListener
desc: Remove a previously added change listener.

name: ICredentialStore
desc:
Interface for credential stores which are used to store and lookup credentials
to authenticate against external services.

name: lookup
desc: Lookups credential parameters by its key.

name: store
desc: Stores credential parameters into the store.

name: IDiscovery
desc:
Interface for discovery services which are used to store and resolve connection parameters
to connect to external services.

name: register
desc: Registers connection parameters into the discovery service.

name: resolveAll
desc: Resolves all connection parameters by their key.

name: resolveOne
desc: Resolves a single connection parameters by its key.

name: JsonConfigReader
desc: Config reader that reads configuration from JSON file.

name: JsonConfigReader
desc: Creates a new instance of the config reader.

name: readConfig
desc: Reads configuration and parameterize it with given values.

name: readConfig_
desc: Reads configuration from a file, parameterize it with given values and returns a new ConfigParams object.

name: readObject
desc: Reads configuration file, parameterizes its content and converts it into JSON object.

name: readObject_
desc: Reads configuration file, parameterizes its content and converts it into JSON object.

name: MemoryConfigReader
desc: Config reader that stores configuration in memory.

name: MemoryConfigReader
desc: Creates a new instance of config reader.

name: addChangeListener
desc: Adds a listener that will be notified when configuration is changed

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: readConfig
desc: Reads configuration and parameterize it with given values.

name: removeChangeListener
desc: Remove a previously added change listener.

name: MemoryCredentialStore
desc: Credential store that keeps credentials in memory.

name: MemoryCredentialStore
desc: Creates a new instance of the credential store.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: lookup
desc: Lookups credential parameters by its key.

name: readCredentials
desc:
Reads credentials from configuration parameters.
Each section represents an individual CredentialParams

name: store
desc: Stores credential parameters into the store.

name: MemoryDiscovery
desc: Discovery service that keeps connections in memory.

name: MemoryDiscovery
desc: Creates a new instance of discovery service.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: readConnections
desc:
Reads connections from configuration parameters.
Each section represents an individual Connectionparams

name: register
desc: Registers connection parameters into the discovery service.

name: resolveAll
desc: Resolves all connection parameters by their key.

name: resolveOne
desc: Resolves a single connection parameters by its key.

name: YamlConfigReader
desc: Config reader that reads configuration from YAML file.

name: YamlConfigReader
desc: Creates a new instance of the config reader.

name: readConfig
desc: Reads configuration and parameterize it with given values.

name: readConfig_
desc: Reads configuration from a file, parameterize it with given values and returns a new ConfigParams object.

name: readObject
desc: Reads configuration file, parameterizes its content and converts it into JSON object.

name: readObject_
desc: Reads configuration file, parameterizes its content and converts it into JSON object.
